## dev package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ProsemirrorDevTools](./dev.prosemirrordevtools.md) | A component that should be placed within the remirror context and will automatically wrap the prosemirror view and create a lovely dev tools components.<!-- -->Make sure not to use this in production as it increase the bundle size quite significantly.<!-- -->Based on https://github.com/d4rkr00t/prosemirror-dev-tools |
